item.title: DPG Spring Meeting of the Condensed Matter Section (SKM) 2023
item.description:
The DPG Spring Meeting of the Condensed Matter Section (SKM) will be held on the campus of the Technical University Dresden from March 26th to March 31st, 2023.

On Wednesday March 29th, I will be presenting a talk titled “A femtosecond resolved view of vibrationally assisted electron transfer across the metal/aqueous interface”. Additionally, on Monday March 27th, I will present a poster entitled “2D Lattice Gas Order-Disorder Transition Studied by LEED and Vibrational Sum Frequency Generation Spectroscopy.” I would like to warmly invite you to attend both my talk and poster to learn more about our latest research activities.

Additionally, I will chair the session “2D Materials IV: Heterostructures” on Thursday, March 30th.

I am looking forward to an exciting conference in Dresden!

Download the conference program .

item.title: The 31st Annual Conference of Gesellschaft Chinesischer Physiker in Deutschland (GCPD) e.V.
item.description:
Dear Colleagues and Friends,

The Society of Chinese Physicists in Germany (GCPD, http://gcpd.eu/index.htm) is organizing its 31st annual conference which will be held in a hybrid format on September 16th-17th, 2022. Presence meetings will be hosted in Berlin (Germany) and Changchun (China) in parallel. Online participation will be also an option.

The purpose of the annual conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners with a background related to physics from Germany and China together to discuss the recent scientific and technological advancements in their fields, as well as strengthen the scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation between China and Germany in the post-pandemic era. On behalf of the organization committee, we would like to invite you to attend this event.

The past two annual meetings were organized in the same format and turned out to be of great success (see http://gcpd.eu/2021_web/program.html for example). We will feel really privileged if you could attend the event.

You can find more information on the registration and programs below.

Conference register link: https://forms.office.com/r/8uV5MHtRTZ

Conference webpage: http://gcpd.eu/2022_web/index.html

Yours faithfully,

Dr. Zhipeng Huang

on behalf of GCPD-2022 organization committee

Download the conference program (tentative).
